text: NewsPim (Ko: 뉴스핌) or Newspim is a news and media company founded in April, 2003. The company has two economic newspapers, NewsPim and Anda, the latter of which was first published in July 2016. Its director is Byeongbok Min (Ko: 민 병복). The company is one of the news sources for Factiva,https://archive.today/20181007202505/https://dow- jones-2097.docs.contently.com/print/106981 https://archive.today/20170415094605/https://dow- jones-2097.docs.contently.com/v/factiva-content-from-the-asia-pacific-region pdf file: https://dow-jones-2097.docs.contently.com/print/106981?raw_file=true and has signed a strategic alliance deal with Koscom.코스콤-뉴스핌, 전략적 제휴 체결, 디지털데일리, 2006.04.03, http://www.ddaily.co.kr/news/article.html?no=9215 == See also == * List of newspapers in South Korea == References == Category:Korean- language newspapers Category:Newspapers published in South Korea Category:Newspaper companies of South Korea Category:Publications established in 2003 Category:Mass media in Seoul
title: NewsPim
